# HKElectrocardiogramQuery.Result

**Enumeration**

Partial results for an electrocardiogram query.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Result
```

## Overview

The query returns a [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKElectrocardiogramQuery/Result/measurement(_:)] result for each voltage measurement, followed by a [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKElectrocardiogramQuery/Result/done] result.

## Results

- **HKElectrocardiogramQuery.Result.measurement(_:)**: A single voltage measurement.
- **HKElectrocardiogramQuery.Result.done**: The query has finished returning voltage measurements.
- **HKElectrocardiogramQuery.Result.error(_:)**: An error occurred while accessing the voltage measurements.

## Accessing the Results

- **init(electrocardiogram:dataHandler:)**: Creates a new electrocardiogram query object.
